dynamic_line: The lords have been placing us knights in places around the country just in case something bad happens.
I know I have orders to report as soon as something bad happens but I can't simply ride off while there's a massacre at my back.
I'm glad there are guards around here too. We can usually take care of something on our own but backup is always appreciated.
I wish my squire was here. They always could polish this armour just right to make it truly gleam.
Don't worry, if I see any monsters I'll take care of them.
We're generally respected and revered, but some peasants will always have that glare that tells you some corrupt knight has wronged thme or their family in the past.
